meanings.sent1: The grass looked dewier this morning after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden were dewier than the ones in the shade.
meanings.sent3: The dewier leaves sparkled like tiny diamonds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as dewier as a fresh morning meadow.
meanings.sent5: The dewier air made everything feel fresh and alive.

meanings.sent1: The dewier grass felt cool under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The dewier morning made the spider webs glisten.
meanings.sent3: The dewier path led us through the forest to a hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as dewier as the morning mist.
meanings.sent5: The dewier petals of the rose held droplets of rain like jewels.
